snippet.title: MERGE HAMSTER - Android Gameplay
snippet.description:
Squeeeak!!! The hamsters are angry!!

An evil force has suddenly appeared in the once peaceful forest of the hamsters, disturbing their tranquility.
Their peaceful days of eating and sleeping have been shattered, and they can no longer tolerate it!
Don’t underestimate them because of their small size! It’s time to show what the hamsters can do!

Merge Hamster is an idle merge game. Recruit hamsters, merge and upgrade various weapons, and protect the forest!

Developed by DAERI SOFT Inc.

#theforeseenarcade #android #androidgameplay #androidgames #hamster #hamsters #mergehamster #idlemerge #idlemergegame #mergegame #idlegame #idlegames
